articles.author: Lindsey Bahr
articles.title: After two big weekends, the North American box office takes a hit - AP News
articles.description: The North American box office has slowed down after a strong September. "Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba Infinity Castle" remains at the top, adding $17.3 million over the weekend. This makes it the highest-grossing anime film ever in North America. "Him," a f…
articles.content: Neither a Jordan Peele-produced horror nor a Margot Robbie and Colin Farrell romantic drama were enough to continue the September hot streak at the movies. After back-to-back weekends that had films … [+4458 chars]
